title: Evaluating the efficacy of peroxyacetic acid in preventing Salmonella cross-contamination on tomatoes in a model flume system
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Christopher R. Pabst, Karuna Kharel, Jaysankar De, Cameron A. Bardsley, Bruna Bertoldi, Keith R. Schneider
